original_text: People who hate you will be ashamed. Wicked people will have nowhere to live.’ People who hate you will be ashamed.
korean_text: 너를 미워하는 자는 부끄러움을 당할 것이라 악인의 장막은 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: People who hate you will be ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 미워하는 사람들은 수치를 당할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Wicked people will have nowhere to live
People who hate you will be ashamed
